mapper.insert: insert into business_member(bm_id, bm_pw, bm_num, bm_phone, bm_address, bm_manager, bm_store_name) values(#{manager.bm_id},#{manager.bm_pw},#{manager.bm_num},#{manager.bm_phone},#{manager.bm_address}, #{manager.bm_manager}, #{manager.bm_store_name})
mapper.update: update business_member set bm_session_id = #{businessmember.bm_session_id}, bm_session_limit = #{businessmember.bm_session_limit} where bm_id = #{businessmember.bm_id}
